entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.1.6
entry.content:
ğŸ’¡ Major Updates - Added redirect URL support for signup and login flows by @winter100004 in #15 - Introduced member-related features by @winter100004 in #24

ğŸ”” Breaking Changes - Refactored error handling mechanisms by @winter100004 in #21

ğŸ„ Enhancements - Improved word wrapping functionality by @winter100004 in #23

ğŸ Bug Fixes - Fixed issue where login configuration could not be obtained for Email, Google, etc. by @winter100004 in #17 - Updated README documentation by @dongfengtaoadmin in #18 - Updated docker-compose command in README by @winter100004 in #20

ğŸ‘ Special Thanks - @dongfengtaoadmin made their first contribution in #18

ğŸ”” Full Changelog - v0.1.5...v0.1.6

entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.1.7
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Update sidebar icons and add new icons to shared package by @winter100004 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/26
  • feat: Update theme configuration with new checklist and launcher styles by @winter100004 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/29
  • refactor: Simplify registration page component structure by @winter100004 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/30
  • fix(web): resolve authentication error for me query before login by @winter100004 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/31
  • enhancement: targetEnvironment added by @devcodes9 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/33
  • enhancement: make targetEnvironmentId optional and update permissionsâ€¦ by @winter100004 in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/34

New Contributors

  • @devcodes9 made their first contribution in https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/33

Full Changelog: https://github.com/usertour/usertour/compare/v0.1.6...v0.1.7

entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.1.8
entry.content:
ğŸ’¡ Major Updates
- Added support for surveys (Multi Line Text, Single Line Text, Multiple Choice, Star Rating, Scale, NPS) by @winter100004 in #51
- Flow analytics now support surveys and session detail viewing by @winter100004 in #51

ğŸ„ Enhancements
- Added height parameter by @devcodes9 in #43
- Added content type for duplication feature by @devcodes9 in #49
- Version updated to 0.1.9 with display height label in embed by @winter100004 in #45

ğŸ Bug Fixes
- Fixed step trigger activation and jump behavior by @winter100004 in #39
- Fixed server hot reload issue by @devcodes9 in #50

ğŸ‘ Special Thanks
- @devcodes9 for multiple contributions (#43, #49, #50)

ğŸ”” Full Changelog
v0.1.7...v0.1.8: https://github.com/usertour/usertour/compare/v0.1.7...v0.1.8

entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.1.9
entry.content:
ğŸš€ UserTour v0.1.9 Release Notes ğŸ’¡ Major Updates

Stripe Integration: Added payment functionality with Stripe, including version display for paid features.

Session Data Export: Supports CSV exports with customizable fields (standard user attributes or full user properties).

ğŸ”” Breaking Changes

Socket.IO Scaling: Fixed multi-replica deployment compatibility for Socket.IO (infrastructure impact).

ğŸ Bug Fixes

Resolved stability issues in distributed environments.

ğŸ”— Full Changelog: v0.1.8...v0.1.9

entry.title: New release for Usertour: v0.1.10
entry.content:
ğŸš€ New Features

  • Launched the completed REST API, allowing you to synchronize your user data with Usertour and track events directly from your back-end application.
  • Added company segment support in startup rules, enabling content display control based on the company.

ğŸ„ Enhancements

  • Added Prisma direct URL configuration, allowing support for PgBouncer and other Postgres proxies in production environments.
  • Added WebSocket URI path configuration, allowing the use of a given wsUri to handle full URLs with protocol, just domain, and relative path.

ğŸ Bug Fixes

  • Fixed the spelling of "Acount" to "Account" in the admin user navigation.

ğŸ“Š New Contributors

  • @omari58 made their first contribution in [#71](https://github.com/usertour/usertour/pull/71)
